org.gradle.api.plugins

Class MavenPlugin

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.gradle.api.plugins.MavenPlugin
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Plugin<org.gradle.api.internal.project.ProjectInternal>

    public class MavenPlugin
extends Object
implements Plugin<org.gradle.api.internal.project.ProjectInternal>

    A Plugin which allows project artifacts to be deployed to a Maven repository, or installed to the local Maven cache.
